remarks: If ` B ` is an open subset of the subspace base set ` A ` , then any subset of ` B ` is open iff it is open in ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)
statement: restopnb $p |- ( ( ( J e. Top /\ A e. V ) /\ ( B e. J /\ B C_ A /\ C C_ B ) ) -> ( C e. J <-> C e. ( J |`t A ) ) ) $.
